entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
